game.name: USFIV: Classic Wild Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: USFIV의 어레인지 의상 팩. 가일, 블랑카, 달심, 겐, 페이룽의 와일드한 의상. 새로운 어레인지 의상을 입고 라이벌과 차별화를 두자!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new wild outfits for Guile, Blanka, Dhalsim, Gen, and Fei Long.
